properties.description: A description for 'log_all_request_and_response'.

properties.description: A description for 'core_system_name'.

properties.description: A description for 'domain.name'.

properties.name: sr_address
properties.description: Service Registry address.

properties.name: sr_port
properties.description: Service Registry port.

properties.name: mscv.list-name
properties.description: The name of the default verification list, which will be executed unless otherwise defined.

properties.name: mscv.mip-weight
properties.description: The weight of all MIPs in the compliance algorithm.

properties.name: mscv.verification-interval
properties.description: The verification interval of a specific List in minutes.

properties.name: mscv.os
properties.description: Assumed Operating System.

properties.name: mscv.ssh.port
properties.description: Default SSH port.

properties.name: mscv.ssh.connect-timeout
properties.description: The timeout (in seconds) for connecting to SSH targets.

properties.name: mscv.ssh.auth-timeout
properties.description: The timeout (in seconds) for authentication on SSH targets.

properties.name: mscv.ssh.private-key-file
properties.description: The path to the SSH private key file.

properties.name: mscv.ssh.public-key-file
properties.description: The path to the SSH public key file.

properties.name: mscv.ssh.key-pair-file
properties.description: The path to a file which contains a KeyPair.

properties.name: mscv.ssh.private-key-password
properties.description: The password of the private key file. If there is no password, the property 'mscv.ssh.empty-password' must be set to true.

properties.name: mscv.ssh.empty-password
properties.description: Indicates if the private key needs a password.

properties.name: mscv.scripts-path
properties.description: The default path for scripts.
